Name: Full-Stack Applications-Blog
Description: A dynamic full-stack blog application built using the MERN stack, allowing users to create, read, update, and delete posts. Features user authentication, comment functionality, and responsive design for an optimal user experience.

Name: Authentication and Authorization
Description: Authentication and Authorization:- is a MERN stack project that implements secure user authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) for managing resources efficiently.

Name: Full-Stack Applications-MovieSite
Description: A dynamic full-stack MovieSite application built using the MERN stack, allowing users to create, read, update, and delete posts. Features user comment functionality, and responsive design for an optimal user experience.

Name: RESTful API Development
Description: Build scalable REST APIs using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js for efficient data management and seamless frontend integration.

Name: URL Shortener
Description: This MERN stack application allows users to shorten long URLs into compact links that are easy to share. The app features a user-friendly interface for inputting URLs, generates unique short links using the nanoid library, and tracks the number of clicks on each shortened URL, providing a seamless and efficient way to manage links.
